name: FLAMBERGE
detailed_description:
How much content is there?

About 2-3 hours. 2 out of 5 chapters are done, and multiplayer will come later.
Now features a challenge editor to edit scenarios for some replay value.


Want to follow the development?

Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/hydezeke. I post a lot there.


Disclaimer from the Developer (Long Development Cycle)

Because we are a very small development team (1 coder, 1 musician), there will be long periods of stagnation for development due to school and work.

However, I can promise this: 2017 will see far more development than 2016. With the most difficult coding challenges out of the way (party menus, item systems, cutscene engine), we can finally focus 90% of our efforts on pure content, which is really encouraging!

Steam provides us a method of updating our backers and those interested in seeing the game progress. Please purchase the game only if you are okay with the long waits between updates.

Please also give us your thoughts about the game! What do you like? What do you want to see? Some of the great ideas implemented in the game came from suggestions from folks we've met online. Shoot us a message! Make the game better!

Thanks much, and feel free to contact us personally if you have any questions!
contact@hydezeke.com
http://www.twitter.com/hydezeke


About the Game

FLAMBERGE is a "simultaneous turn-based tactics RPG". Players plan out multiple movements and attacks at once, and the turn is resolved at the same time as the enemy. The player must anticipate enemy actions in order to win.

At heart, though, Flamberge is mostly an RPG. Players will control many different characters with different abilities and strengths, and level those characters to add new traits and abilities.

short_description: Flamberge is a tactics RPG featuring free movement and simultaneous turns. Players plan out their moves ahead of time, then during execution, both allies and enemies will act at the same time.
